caption: A man and a woman are in a museum, and they have an argument. In another house, one man has just returned and there is also a man already in the room. They say something and leave the house together. They are apart at the front of the house; one takes a taxi. And near the taxi, a woman is taking photo. The man who takes the taxi goes to the police station and get something from the policeman, and they gather again near the entrance of a subway. After that, they go to a shop owned by a Chinese old woman.

global.question: How many characters appears in this video?
global.answer: There're six people in the video.
